document.docTitle: Chalcionellus decemstriatus subsp. decemstriatus decemstriatus (P. Rossi
document.masterDocTitle: An updated catalogue of the Histeridae (Coleoptera) of Sardinia, with faunistic, zoogeographical, ecological and conservation remarks *

Italian distribution. All regions except Aosta Valley .
Ecology. According to Yélamos (2002) it is mainly found in cow dung, both in montane habitats and at low altitudes; according to Vienna (1980) it is sometimes found also on carcasses.
Notes. In Penati and Vienna (2005 , 2006a ) the data referring to the specimens from Pula and Ales (CUL) are erroneously given as “Assemini, 1937, coll. Museo Genova” (see “Data collection”).
